MEANINGS.POS_TIP: A word (other than a pronoun) used to identify any of a class of people, places, or things, or to name a particular one of these.
MEANINGS.DEF_EN: The process of identifying the nature of an illness or other medical problem by examination of the symptoms.
MEANINGS.DEF_ZH: 通过检查症状来识别疾病或其他医疗问题性质的过程。
MEANINGS.SENT_EN: The doctor's preliminary diagnosis pointed to a viral infection.
MEANINGS.SENT_ZH: 医生初步诊断表明是病毒感染。

MEANINGS.POS_TIP: A word (other than a pronoun) used to identify any of a class of people, places, or things, or to name a particular one of these.
MEANINGS.DEF_EN: The conclusion or finding reached after a diagnostic process.
MEANINGS.DEF_ZH: 诊断过程后得出的结论或结果。
MEANINGS.SENT_EN: Her diagnosis of diabetes came as a shock to the family.
MEANINGS.SENT_ZH: 她被诊断出患有糖尿病，这让家人感到震惊。

MEANINGS.POS_TIP: A word (other than a pronoun) used to identify any of a class of people, places, or things, or to name a particular one of these.
MEANINGS.DEF_EN: An analysis or identification of the cause or nature of a non-medical problem or situation.
MEANINGS.DEF_ZH: 对非医学问题或情况的起因或性质进行分析或识别。
MEANINGS.SENT_EN: The committee's diagnosis of the company's financial troubles was accurate.
MEANINGS.SENT_ZH: 委员会对公司财务困境的诊断是准确的。

REGISTER: Formal or technical, especially in medical and scientific contexts.
